parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give a commission (instructions), order; To admonish, prohibit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To give a commission (instructions), order; To admonish, prohibit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From peri; superabundant or superior; by implication, excessive; adverbially violently; neuter preeminence.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
